original_text: The Lord says, ‘The people in Edom have done more and more wrong things. So I will certainly punish them. They took their swords and they chased after their cousins, the Israelites. They were not kind. Instead, they continued to be angry all the time. They did not stop attacking them. The Edomites and the Israelites were from the same family. The Edomites were descendants of Esau. The Israelites were descendants of Jacob. These two brothers were born at the same time from the same mother. Jacob also had the name Israel. korean_text: 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시되 에돔의 서너 가지 죄로 말미암아 내가 그 벌을 돌이키지 아니하리니 이는 그가 칼로 그의 형제를 쫓아가며 긍휼을 버리며 항상 맹렬히 화를 내며 분을 끝없이 품었음이라

sentences.original_text: have done more and more wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 점점 더 많은 잘못된 일을 했다

sentences.original_text: So I will certainly punish them
and they chased after their cousins
Instead, they continued to be angry
They did not stop attacking them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들을 공격하는 것을 멈추지 않았다

sentences.original_text: The Edomites were descendants of Esau
The Israelites were descendants of Jacob
were born at the same time
Jacob also had the name Israel
